hero.headline: Build Apps That
hero.description: Turn your ideas into real web and mobile apps. No fluff, just results.

services.subtitle: Everything you need to build, learn, and scale your app.

services.title: Build Your App
services.description: Full-stack development with modern technologies. We handle the code, you focus on your vision.

services.title: Learn to Code
services.description: Master development through real projects. Learn by building apps that people actually use.

services.title: Grow Your Product
services.description: Strategic guidance to validate your idea and scale your app with confidence.

services.specialtiesDescription: From simple MVPs to complex platforms

values.subtitle: Our approach to building apps and growing developers.

items.title: Build Real Things
items.description: No theoretical projects. Everything we build solves real problems for real users.

items.title: Learn by Doing
items.description: The best way to learn coding is by building actual apps, not just tutorials.

items.title: No BS Communication
items.description: Clear updates, honest timelines, and jargon-free explanations.

items.title: Your Success = Our Success
items.description: We win when your app succeeds and your skills grow.

items.title: Ship Fast, Improve Always
items.description: Get your app to users quickly, then make it better based on real feedback.

values.approachP1: We're developers who got tired of seeing great ideas stuck in development hell. So we built Vooksio to help founders ship apps faster and help developers learn through real projects.
values.approachP2: Whether you need an app built or want to learn to build them yourself, we're here to help you succeed.

traits.title: Results-Focused
traits.description: Your app's success is our priority

traits.title: Ship-First Mindset
traits.description: Build it, ship it, improve it

sectionHeader.title: For Every Stage
sectionHeader.description: Whether you're just starting or ready to scale, we've got you covered.

stats.label: On-Time Delivery
stats.description: We ship when we say we will
